languages.text: "А, это..." {n}Владайм морщится.{/n} "Кто знает? Может, настоящая эпидемия. А может, те две семьи, с которых началось, просто чем-то дружно отравились. Мы на космической станции, здесь лучшее решение — изолировать район и ждать, пока проблема решит себя сама".

"Oh, that..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "Who knows? It could be an actual epidemic. Or perhaps the two families that started it all just came down with food poisoning at the same time. We're on a space station — the best solution here is to isolate the area and wait for the problem to resolve itself."
languages.original_text: "А, это..." {n}Владайм морщится.{/n} "Кто знает? Может, настоящая эпидемия. А может, те две семьи, с которых началось, просто чем-то дружно отравились. Мы на космической станции, здесь лучшее решение — изолировать район и ждать, пока проблема решит себя сама".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, that..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "Who knows? Could be an actual epidemic. Could be that the two families that started it all had simultaneous cases of food poisoning. We're on a space station, the best solution here is to isolate the area and wait for the problem to solve itself."

"Oh, that..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "Who knows? Could be an actual epidemic. Could be that the two families that started it all had simultaneous cases of food poisoning. We're on a space station, the best solution here is to isolate the area and wait for the problem to solve itself."

"Oh, that..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "Who knows? It could be an actual epidemic. Or perhaps the two families that started it all just came down with food poisoning at the same time. We're on a space station — the best solution here is to isolate the area and wait for the problem to resolve itself."

"Oh, that..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "Who knows? It could be an actual epidemic. Or perhaps the two families that started it all just came down with food poisoning at the same time. We're on a space station — the best solution here is to isolate the area and wait for the problem to resolve itself."

"Oh, that..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "Who knows? It could be an actual epidemic. Or perhaps the two families that started it all just came down with food poisoning at the same time. We're on a space station — the best solution here is to isolate the area and wait for the problem to resolve itself."

languages.text: 「あぁ、その件は…」{n}ヴラダイムは顔をしかめた。{/n}「誰にも分からないのだよ。実際に伝染病かもしれない。はたまた、元凶の2組の家族が同時に食中毒を起こしたのかも。ここは宇宙ステーションだ。最善の解決策は、その地域を隔離して、問題が自然に解決するのを待つことだよ」
languages.original_text: "Oh, that..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "Who knows? It could be an actual epidemic. Or perhaps the two families that started it all just came down with food poisoning at the same time. We're on a space station — the best solution here is to isolate the area and wait for the problem to resolve itself."

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、その件は…」{n}ヴラダイムは顔をしかめた。{/n}「誰にも分からないのだよ。実際に伝染病かもしれない。はたまた、元凶の2組の家族が同時に食中毒を起こしたのかも。ここは宇宙ステーションだ。最善の解決策は、その地域を隔離して、問題が自然に解決するのを待つことだよ」

languages.text: “哦，那个啊……”{n}他露出了不悦的表情。{/n}“谁知道呢？说不定爆发了流行病，也说不定只不过是两个家庭刚好同时食物中毒了。不过我们这是在空间站上，最好的解决办法就是隔离那片区域，等待问题自行解决。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, that..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "Who knows? It could be an actual epidemic. Or perhaps the two families that started it all just came down with food poisoning at the same time. We're on a space station — the best solution here is to isolate the area and wait for the problem to resolve itself."

traits.locale_text: “哦，那个啊……”{n}他露出了不悦的表情。{/n}“谁知道呢？说不定爆发了流行病，也说不定只不过是两个家庭刚好同时食物中毒了。不过我们这是在空间站上，最好的解决办法就是隔离那片区域，等待问题自行解决。”

languages.text: «Ah, eso...». {n}Hace una mueca.{/n} «¿Quién sabe? Puede que sea una epidemia de verdad, ¿eh? O tal vez que las dos familias que lo instigaron todo se intoxicaran al mismo tiempo. Estamos en una estación espacial; la mejor solución es aislar la zona y esperar a que se resuelva el problema solo».
languages.original_text: "Oh, that..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "Who knows? It could be an actual epidemic. Or perhaps the two families that started it all just came down with food poisoning at the same time. We're on a space station — the best solution here is to isolate the area and wait for the problem to resolve itself."

traits.locale_text: «Ah, eso...». {n}Hace una mueca.{/n} «¿Quién sabe? Puede que sea una epidemia de verdad, ¿eh? O tal vez que las dos familias que lo instigaron todo se intoxicaran al mismo tiempo. Estamos en una estación espacial; la mejor solución es aislar la zona y esperar a que se resuelva el problema solo».

languages.text: {n}Il grimace.{/n} « Oh, ça... Qui sait ? Peut-être une véritable épidémie. Ou alors, les deux familles qui ont mis le feu aux poudres ont été foudroyées par une intoxication alimentaire exactement au même moment. Dans une station spatiale, la meilleure solution est d'isoler la zone affectée et d'attendre que le problème se décante de lui-même. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, that..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "Who knows? It could be an actual epidemic. Or perhaps the two families that started it all just came down with food poisoning at the same time. We're on a space station — the best solution here is to isolate the area and wait for the problem to resolve itself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il grimace.{/n} « Oh, ça... Qui sait ? Peut-être une véritable épidémie. Ou alors, les deux familles qui ont mis le feu aux poudres ont été foudroyées par une intoxication alimentaire exactement au même moment. Dans une station spatiale, la meilleure solution est d'isoler la zone affectée et d'attendre que le problème se décante de lui-même. »

languages.text: "Ach, das ..." {n}Er verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Das weiß niemand. Es könnte eine echte Epidemie sein. Vielleicht hatten die zwei Familien, mit denen alles angefangen hat, wirklich nur gleichzeitig eine Lebensmittelvergiftung. Wir sind hier auf einer Raumstation – die beste Lösung ist, den Bereich zu isolieren und darauf zu warten, dass sich das Problem von selbst löst."
languages.original_text: "Oh, that..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "Who knows? It could be an actual epidemic. Or perhaps the two families that started it all just came down with food poisoning at the same time. We're on a space station — the best solution here is to isolate the area and wait for the problem to resolve itself."

traits.locale_text: "Ach, das ..." {n}Er verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Das weiß niemand. Es könnte eine echte Epidemie sein. Vielleicht hatten die zwei Familien, mit denen alles angefangen hat, wirklich nur gleichzeitig eine Lebensmittelvergiftung. Wir sind hier auf einer Raumstation – die beste Lösung ist, den Bereich zu isolieren und darauf zu warten, dass sich das Problem von selbst löst."

languages.text: "Ha, şu mesele..." {n}Yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "Kim bilir? Gerçek bir salgın da olabilir, olayların başlamasının müsebbibi iki aile aynı anda gıda zehirlenmesi geçirmiş de olabilir. Uzay istasyonundayız. Burada en iyi çözüm, bölgeyi izole edip sorunun kendiliğinden çözülmesini beklemektir."
languages.original_text: "Oh, that..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "Who knows? It could be an actual epidemic. Or perhaps the two families that started it all just came down with food poisoning at the same time. We're on a space station — the best solution here is to isolate the area and wait for the problem to resolve itself."

traits.locale_text: "Ha, şu mesele..." {n}Yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "Kim bilir? Gerçek bir salgın da olabilir, olayların başlamasının müsebbibi iki aile aynı anda gıda zehirlenmesi geçirmiş de. Bir uzay istasyonundayız. Burada en iyi çözüm bölgeyi izole edip sorunun kendiliğinden çözülmesini beklemektir."
